user_question: Can you tell me about the influence of African rhythms on jazz music and generate an image of a jazz band from the 1920s?
final_answer: African rhythms have significantly influenced jazz music, particularly through the use of syncopation and polyrhythms. Image of a 1920s jazz band generated. In the 1930s, jazz evolved into swing, characterized by big bands and a more danceable rhythm.
